participation.instructionsReviewed: You have reviewed the instructions. You may now read the example submissions

exerciseAssessmentDashboard.testRunPageHeader: Test Run Exercise Dashboard for exercise:

description.NOT_PARTICIPATED: Please read the assessment instructions carefully and confirm that you have understood them.
description.REVIEWED_INSTRUCTIONS: Please open Example Submissions and start training.
description.TRAINED: Now you can start assessing students' submissions.

exerciseAssessmentDashboard.youAssessedSoFar: You have assessed {{numberOfTutorAssessments}} submissions so far
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.needToReadGradingInstructions: You need to read the assessment instructions before starting assessing
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.readAndUnderstood: I have read and understood the instructions
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.totalExampleSubmissions: There are {{total}} example submissions: {{toRead}} to read and {{toAssess}} to assess.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.pleaseContactIfUnclear: In case something is unclear, please contact an instructor before you start assessing.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noSubmissions: There are currently no submissions for you to grade.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.startAssessmentFromTeamPages: Assessments for team exercises are started from the pages of your teams.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noComplaints: There are no complaints at the moment.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noComplaintsDisplayed: There are no complaints at the moment (excluding complaints about your own assessments)
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noMoreFeedbackRequests: There are no requests at the moment.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noMoreFeedbackRequestsDisplayed: There are no requests at the moment (excluding request about your own assessments)
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.complaintHint: Shows complaints about other tutors' assessments. Note: complaints about your own assessments will not be displayed here.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.moreFeedbackRequestHint: Shows more feedback requests for your assessments.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noSubmissionsInfo: You may not assess any submissions this round. {{notYetAssessed}} submissions have yet to be assessed, of which {{lockedSubmissionsByOtherTutor}} are currently locked by other tutors
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noSubmissionsInfoSecondCorrection: and {{firstRoundAssessments}} were assessed by you in the first round.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.noSubmissionsBecauseFirstAssessedByYours: In the second correction round you may only assess submissions which you did not assess in the first round.
exerciseAssessmentDashboard.correctionRoundNotYetEnabled: This correction round is not yet enabled.
